simplified: Pedro Castillo was kicked out as president of Peru. || His supporters felt their political rights were taken away by left-wing and far-left groups. || As a result, social organizations and native peoples organized many demonstrations, known as the 2022 Peruvian political protests.

original: The Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines closes the country's airspace for nearly six hours due to a power outage in its air traffic management center, affecting around 282 commercial flights and over 56,000 passengers.
simplified: The Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines closed their airspace for six hours due to a power outage in its air traffic center, affecting many commercial flights and passengers.

original: The Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines closes the country's airspace for nearly six hours due to a power outage in its air traffic management center, affecting around 282 commercial flights and over 56,000 passengers.
simplified: The Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines closes the country's airspace for nearly six hours due to a power outage in its air traffic management center. || This affects around 282 commercial flights and over 56,000 passengers.

original: Young's first collection of verse, Genius and Fancy, described as "a survey of the London stage," was published in 1791, went into a second edition in 1795, and then was immediately republished in an expanded edition with three times the number of pages as the original.
simplified: Young's first collection of poetry, Genius and Fancy, was described as "a survey of the London stage". || It was published in 1791, went into a second edition in 1795, and then was republished soon after in an expanded edition, which had three times the number of pages as the original.

simplified: In 1791, Young's first poetry book, named Genius and Fancy, was released and became successful. || It was described as "a survey of the London stage" and was followed by an even larger second edition with triple the number of pages as the original.
